page.title: 04DISTRICT COUNCIL OFFICES
page.content: Reports are typed on different colours for each department _ agenda (white), planning (gold), housing (mauve), amenities (blue), policy and finance (green), environmental health (cream). The planning department has about 2000 applications a year.Records have been kept since 1948.We saw a room full of files,but they are being micro-filmed and stored in computers. Computer terminals are now being in- stalled in most departments,with links to Aylesbury and Chesham.Because the information is valuable,the windows of the computer room are barred;a burglar alarm has been fitted;the tapes are stored in a virtually indestuctable cabinet;and there is an emergency back up system in case of power failure. A franking machine is used for postage and a credit card of Â£1000 lasts for only two weeks!
